Sentencas: Semiconductor ionic electrolytes, especially heterostructure composites, have a significant role in enhancing oxide ion conductivity and peak power density (PPD) because of their interfacial contact.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: In this work, the fluorite structure CeO2 and spinel-based CoAl2O4 samples, as a heterostructure composite electrolyte, are successfully fabricated.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The p-type CoAl2O4 and n-type CeO2 heterostructure (CeO2-CoAl2O4) used as an electrolyte exhibits a cell performance of 758 mW/cm(2) under fuel cell H-2/air conditions at 550 & DEG;C, which is quite higher than the pure CoAl2O4 and CeO2 fuel cell devices.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and high-resolution transmission electron microscopy (HR-TEM) verified the heterostructure formation including the morphological analysis of the prepared heterostructure composite.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: The heterostructure-based CeO2-CoAl2O4 composite achieved a higher ionic conductivity of 0.13 S/cm at 550 & DEG;C temperature, which means that the constructed device successfully works as an electrolyte by suppressing electronic conductivity.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the obtained results demonstrate the semiconductor ionic heterostructure effect by adjusting the appropriate composition to build heterostructure of the n-type (CeO2) and p-type (CoAl2O4) components and built-in electric field.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)

Sentencas: So, this work exhibits that the constructed device can be effective for energy conversion and storage devices.
Titulo: Developing CeO2-CoAl2O4 Semiconductor Ionic Based Heterostructure Composite Electrolyte for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs)
